voiceRequirement.title: Voice Requirement
voiceRequirement.description: Record your requirement by voice and send it instantly.

financial-advisory.title: Virtual CFO Services
financial-advisory.brief: Not every client can hire a full-time CFO — but every growing business needs strategic financial leadership. We enable you to deliver Virtual CFO capabilities, helping clients with strategy, governance, cash flow control, and performance direction — positioning you as their long-term financial partner.
steps: Assess financial health and growth objectives

financial-advisory.title: Budget & Cost Management
financial-advisory.brief: Uncontrolled costs erode margins silently. We help you guide clients in building disciplined budgeting frameworks and cost optimisation strategies that protect profitability without slowing growth.

financial-advisory.title: Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A)
financial-advisory.brief: Financial planning is no longer annual forecasting — it is continuous decision intelligence. We empower you to provide structured forecasting, scenario planning, and performance analytics that drive informed business decisions.

financial-advisory.title: Reporting & MIS
financial-advisory.brief: Clear reporting builds confidence at the board and investor level. We help you implement structured MIS frameworks that convert raw numbers into actionable business intelligence.

cybersecurity-data-privacy.title: ISO/IEC 27001 Certification
cybersecurity-data-privacy.brief: Information security is now a business expectation. We enable you to guide clients through ISO/IEC 27001 certification, strengthening data protection, governance, and stakeholder trust.

cybersecurity-data-privacy.title: SOC Certification (Type 1 & Type 2)
cybersecurity-data-privacy.brief: Global clients demand SOC assurance before partnerships. We help you prepare clients for SOC 1/2 (Type 1 & Type 2) compliance — improving credibility and unlocking enterprise opportunities.

cybersecurity-data-privacy.title: GDPR Compliance
cybersecurity-data-privacy.brief: If your clients handle EU data, GDPR compliance is mandatory. We help you structure privacy frameworks that reduce legal exposure and reputational risk.

cybersecurity-data-privacy.title: HIPAA Compliance
cybersecurity-data-privacy.brief: Healthcare data requires strict protection. We support consultants in guiding healthcare and health-tech clients toward HIPAA-compliant systems and safeguards.
steps: Risk assessment of health data systems

cybersecurity-data-privacy.title: Global Data Privacy Compliance
cybersecurity-data-privacy.brief: Data laws are evolving worldwide. We help you equip clients with cross-border privacy frameworks that ensure compliance across multiple jurisdictions.

cybersecurity-data-privacy.title: Cybersecurity Implementation
cybersecurity-data-privacy.brief: Strategy without execution creates vulnerability. We support real-world cybersecurity implementation — from access controls to system hardening — protecting client infrastructure.

cybersecurity-data-privacy.title: AI Audit
cybersecurity-data-privacy.brief: AI adoption brings new risks — bias, privacy breaches, governance gaps. We help you guide clients in auditing AI systems to ensure ethical, compliant, and secure deployment.

risk-advisory.title: Corporate Governance & Compliance
risk-advisory.brief: Strong governance builds investor trust and long-term stability. We help consulting firms guide their clients in establishing robust governance structures, regulatory compliance frameworks, and board-level accountability systems — ensuring credibility in a fast-changing regulatory environment.
steps: Review existing governance and compliance structure
Map regulatory exposure and compliance gaps

risk-advisory.title: Internal Audit & Controls
risk-advisory.brief: Internal audit is no longer fault-finding — it is value protection. We enable you to deliver risk-based internal audit and control assessments that strengthen financial integrity and operational efficiency for your clients.

risk-advisory.title: Policies, SOPs & Process Reengineering
risk-advisory.brief: Undefined processes create inefficiency and compliance risk. We help you structure, document, and redesign client processes to improve clarity, accountability, and scalability.

risk-advisory.title: Business Intelligence & Continuous Improvement
risk-advisory.brief: Data-driven decision-making separates average firms from market leaders. We help you enable clients with structured reporting, dashboards, and performance tracking systems that drive continuous improvement.

risk-advisory.title: IT, Systems & Fraud Risk Audits
risk-advisory.brief: As businesses digitise, system vulnerabilities increase. We support consultants in assessing IT controls, fraud exposure, and system risks — protecting client assets and reputation.

risk-advisory.title: Stock & Fixed Asset Verification
risk-advisory.brief: Asset mismanagement directly impacts profitability. We help you deliver structured verification of stock and fixed assets to ensure financial accuracy and prevent leakage.

risk-advisory.title: SAR Reconciliation & Process Review
risk-advisory.brief: System Application Reports (SAR) and financial reconciliations must align with operational reality. We assist in reviewing reconciliation frameworks to reduce reporting errors and strengthen reliability.

risk-advisory.title: Third-Party Risk Management
risk-advisory.brief: Vendors, partners, and outsourced functions introduce hidden risks. We help you equip clients with structured third-party risk assessment frameworks to prevent compliance failures and operational disruption.

esg-advisory.title: ESG & Sustainability Reporting
esg-advisory.brief: Investors, regulators, and stakeholders now expect structured ESG disclosures. We enable you to guide clients in building transparent sustainability reports that enhance credibility, valuation, and investor confidence.

esg-advisory.title: Supply Chain Audit & Data Gathering
esg-advisory.brief: ESG responsibility extends beyond the company — into its supply chain. We help you equip clients with structured supplier audits and ESG data collection systems to reduce hidden risks.

esg-advisory.title: Carbon Emissions Estimation
esg-advisory.brief: Carbon transparency is becoming mandatory. We support consultants in helping clients measure, track, and manage carbon emissions — building accountability and sustainability positioning.

esg-advisory.title: Climate Risk Assessment
esg-advisory.brief: Climate risks directly impact financial performance and long-term resilience. We help you assess and integrate climate-related risks into business strategy and reporting.

esg-advisory.title: Compliance Trainings
esg-advisory.brief: ESG transformation requires organisational alignment. We provide structured training programs to build awareness, accountability, and implementation capability across client teams.

erp-implementation-digital-transformatio.title: ERP Module Review & Report Optimization
erp-implementation-digital-transformatio.brief: Many businesses invest in ERP systems but fail to extract full value. We enable you to help clients optimise ERP modules, improve reporting accuracy, and convert system data into decision-ready insights.
steps: Gap identification in workflows and reporting

erp-implementation-digital-transformatio.title: Master Data Management
erp-implementation-digital-transformatio.brief: Poor master data leads to reporting errors, operational delays, and compliance risks. We help you guide clients in structuring, cleansing, and governing master data for long-term accuracy and control.

erp-implementation-digital-transformatio.title: Department-Wise Digital Transformation
erp-implementation-digital-transformatio.brief: Digital transformation must go beyond technology — it must reshape how departments operate. We support you in redesigning finance, operations, HR, and supply chain processes for efficiency and scalability.

erp-implementation-digital-transformatio.title: AI Integration for Process Efficiency & Insights
erp-implementation-digital-transformatio.brief: AI is redefining operational efficiency. We help you integrate AI-driven tools that enhance forecasting, automate repetitive tasks, detect anomalies, and generate actionable insights.

gcc-operation-hub.title: Support Services
gcc-operation-hub.brief: Global Capability Centers (GCCs) require structured operational, compliance, finance, and governance support. We enable you to guide clients in establishing strong backend frameworks that ensure scalability, efficiency, and regulatory alignment.

gcc-operation-hub.title: Captive Shared Services Center Setup & Stabilization
gcc-operation-hub.brief: Setting up a captive shared services center demands strategic planning, process integration, and talent alignment. We help you support clients from initial setup to operational stabilization, ensuring cost efficiency and performance control.

gcc-operation-hub.title: Build, Operate & Transform (BOT) Model Implementation
gcc-operation-hub.brief: The BOT model enables clients to enter new markets with reduced risk and structured control. We help consultants guide businesses through building operations, managing execution, and transitioning to full ownership seamlessly.

training-workshop.title: Internal Audit
training-workshop.brief: Strong internal audit capability strengthens governance and builds client trust. We provide structured training to enhance risk-based auditing, control evaluation, and reporting effectiveness.

training-workshop.title: ESG & Sustainability
training-workshop.brief: ESG is becoming a strategic priority across industries. We equip professionals with practical knowledge of sustainability reporting, compliance frameworks, and ESG risk management.

training-workshop.title: Cybersecurity & Data Privacy Awareness
training-workshop.brief: Cyber risks and data regulations demand organisational awareness. We conduct practical sessions to build understanding of data protection laws, privacy frameworks, and cybersecurity best practices.

training-workshop.title: AI Implementation
training-workshop.brief: AI adoption must be structured and responsible. We train teams to identify AI opportunities, manage risks, and integrate AI tools into business processes effectively.

training-workshop.title: Leadership & Soft Skills Development
training-workshop.brief: Technical strength must be complemented by leadership capability. We provide development programs to enhance communication, decision-making, and strategic influence.

recruitment-manpower-services.title: Temporary Staffing
recruitment-manpower-services.brief: Business demands fluctuate — but talent gaps cannot slow operations. We enable you to support clients with skilled temporary professionals who maintain continuity, compliance, and performance without long-term hiring commitments.

recruitment-manpower-services.title: Permanent Recruitment
recruitment-manpower-services.brief: The right permanent hire defines long-term business success. We help you deliver structured recruitment solutions that align technical expertise with culture fit — reducing hiring risk and improving retention.

termsAgreement.title: Terms & Conditions Agreement
termsAgreement.subtitle: Please review and sign to complete your partner agreement.
summaryItems: Partner commits to accurate, timely service delivery and ethical business practices.
Confidential information must be protected and used solely for collaboration purposes.
All engagements are subject to BnC Global quality standards and compliance policies.
Any disputes will be handled in good faith and resolved per applicable laws.
Agreement remains valid until terminated by either party with written notice.

sections.title: 1. Parties and Purpose
paragraphs: This Partner Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into between BnC Global Pvt. Ltd. ("BnC Global") and the undersigned partner ("Partner"). The purpose of this Agreement is to define the terms under which the Partner may collaborate with BnC Global to deliver services, generate qualified enquiries, and participate in joint opportunities.
By signing, the Partner confirms authority to enter this Agreement on behalf of its organization and agrees to operate in alignment with BnC Global standards and brand values.

sections.title: 2. Scope of Collaboration
paragraphs: BnC Global may refer opportunities, share leads, or invite the Partner to deliver defined services. The Partner may also introduce client requirements or opportunities to BnC Global for joint delivery.
Specific project scope, pricing, and timelines will be documented separately for each engagement and will form part of this Agreement once accepted by both parties.
bullets: Service delivery is subject to country, sector, and regulatory requirements.
All work must be performed by qualified professionals or approved subcontractors.
Any deviation from agreed scope requires written approval.

sections.title: 3. Term and Onboarding
paragraphs: This Agreement becomes effective on the signature date and remains active unless terminated in accordance with Section 12.
The Partner agrees to complete onboarding steps, including profile completion, compliance declarations, and any required documentation before commencing delivery.

sections.title: 4. Roles and Responsibilities
paragraphs: The Partner is responsible for timely delivery, professional conduct, and maintaining accurate records related to work performed.
BnC Global will provide engagement details, agreed commercial terms, and collaboration support as required.
bullets: Maintain confidentiality of all client and platform information.
Provide status updates, reports, and documentation on request.
Comply with applicable laws, including data protection obligations.

sections.title: 5. Quality Standards
paragraphs: All deliverables must meet BnC Global quality benchmarks. Where required, BnC Global may conduct quality reviews, audits, or request corrective actions.
Repeated quality issues or material non-compliance may lead to suspension or termination.

sections.title: 6. Commercial Terms
paragraphs: Commercial terms, including pricing, revenue share, or referral fees, will be specified per engagement. Payments are subject to successful delivery and acceptance of work.
The Partner is responsible for taxes, statutory obligations, and invoices in accordance with local law.

sections.title: 7. Confidentiality and Data Protection
paragraphs: Both parties agree to keep confidential all non-public information, including client data, pricing, processes, and technical documentation.
Data must be handled securely and only for the purposes of fulfilling the engagement.
bullets: No disclosure to third parties without written consent.
Maintain reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards.
Promptly notify BnC Global of any suspected breach.

sections.title: 8. Intellectual Property
paragraphs: Pre-existing intellectual property remains with the originating party. Work products created specifically for an engagement will be owned as agreed in the project scope.
The Partner may not use BnC Global trademarks or brand assets without prior written approval.

sections.title: 9. Non-Solicitation
paragraphs: During the term of this Agreement and for twelve (12) months thereafter, the Partner shall not directly solicit BnC Global clients, prospects, or employees for competing services without written consent.

sections.title: 10. Liability and Indemnity
paragraphs: Each party is responsible for its own acts and omissions. The Partner agrees to indemnify BnC Global against claims arising from Partner negligence, misconduct, or breach of this Agreement.
Neither party shall be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, except where prohibited by law.

sections.title: 11. Termination
paragraphs: Either party may terminate this Agreement with written notice. BnC Global may terminate immediately in the event of material breach, fraud, or compliance violations.
Upon termination, the Partner must return or securely destroy confidential materials and cease use of BnC Global brand assets.

sections.title: 12. Dispute Resolution and Governing Law
paragraphs: The parties will attempt to resolve disputes in good faith through senior management discussions. If unresolved, disputes will be subject to applicable laws and competent jurisdiction as defined in engagement documentation.
